James Fellows
February 17» 1966
Page two
The vasic problem is the script but Earl doesn't help much since he never had
time to even look at the script until he was ready to shoot. Probably this
is the most important of the six films and yet it is so far the worst film.
Again Marye’^s excuse is that she tried to do what she was told by everyone.
Kit Number 1
I talked on the phone with Gertrude and she gave me verbal approval on the
script February 8, 1966. She said she would send a written approval to you,
but since I haven't had a copy I'm sure she hasn't. I'll write her a letter
confirming her approval.
On February 9» 1966, Earl, Marye and I went over the script for number 1 scene-
by-scene. There were several minor changes agreed upon but all in all Earl
thought it was workable. Production is supposed to start on March 1, 1966.
Kit Number 6
The script for this is the next one on Marye's list. She and I spent a day and
a half working out a treatment for this film. ¥e were at a loss to figure out
how to do what we wanted to do and still come up with something Earl could
understand and do, I think our treatment is great, I'll be anxious to see the
script. ¥e are using the inquiry method of teaching and putting the audience
in a role-playing situation, ¥ith the right person cast or the teacher it
could be great.
P.R. Brochure
¥e are designing and printing a brochure to announce the availability of Kit
Number 5* This will be sent to our mailing list but I would like to have it
included in the next mailing of the Newsletter. If this is possible I need
to know the following.
1. Prom whom do we request permission to have this included in the
mailing?
2. Number of brochures needed?
5* ¥hen will they be sent?
4. To whom do I send these?
Timetable
I tried to talk to Earl about this and all he would say is that since they were
a month and a half late getting their check they were going to be a month and
a half late. I fear that they will just fall further and further behind. Earl
says that the best he can do on starting Number 2 is March 1, and the earliest
on Number 1 will be most likely April 1. I frankly do not believe him. He
also says that even with these he will make the release dates for both films.
Marye will be late on the script for number 6, since she had nothing started
until I got there. ¥e need some examples of outstanding High School lessons to
